commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, this is the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. Thank you for having us today!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Thank you!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Thanks for coming! I've been looking forward to meeting everyone!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Whoa... It's so strange seeing μ's right in front of us.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: μ's in the f-flesh. I might cry!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: We may be competing today, but I hope it's a fun day for everyone!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You might be who we look up to, but we're going to give it all we got!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Let's all do our best!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (What kind of contest is it going to be? I'm so happy, but so nervous. I know everyone from Nijigasaki will give it their all!)

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Now begins the nine contests between μ's and Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Gulp*

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The first contest will be...an eating contest! Let's have a clean, fair contest!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-What?! An eating contest?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What does eating have to do with being a school idol?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmmm... It is nice to see an idol that enjoys eating.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right! School idols need a member that eats big, and loves it! Everyone loves them, and without them, the group is boring!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is that true?! (I had no idea.)

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Nico, you're exaggerating.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: We're putting out Hanayo for our team.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kayo-chin! I'm rooting for you, so do your best!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Thanks! I'll eat as much as I can!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So μ's is sending out Hanayo. She's small, so she probably can't eat that much. We might actually win.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's see... Who in our group seems like they can eat the most?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'll do it! I can eat more than your average girl, and I'm starving right now.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Good luck, Emma.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, you too!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We'll be rooting for you, Emma!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: A gyoza eating contest! Okay, take your seats, you two.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Do your best. Now, let's begin!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Munch* Mm, this gyoza is delicious!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Munch* Yeah, it is!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, it looks so yummy. I'm gonna get some ramen and gyoza later.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They both look like they're really enjoying it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Good, she seems to be eating at a decent pace.)

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Munch* *Munch* Mm, this is delicious!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hanayo is amazing! Look at all the plates she's clearing!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Munch* More, please!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What?! She's on her third plate already!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm only on my second!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, can I have a bowl of rice with that, too?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whaaat?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Won't she get full from eating rice?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hanayo loves rice. She's small, so it makes you wonder where all that food goes.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see now. Hanayo is incredible!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I think Kayo-chin has two different stomachs! One for rice, the other for gyoza!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Mm, gyoza tastes so much better with rice!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Is this...our loss?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It can't be...!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Rice to go with your gyoza? I never thought of that.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Huh? What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'll have some bread with mine, please!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Emma?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm not sure that's a good idea!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm trying to learn from Hanayo! Maybe it will let me eat more.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Emma is cute when she eats, too. I bet these two would get along.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Don't worry, I'll take you to the infirmary if you eat too much and pass out!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I hope she'll be okay.)

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Mm-mm! Gyoza and bread really go well together. Buono!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: More gyoza, please!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa! Emma-chi, you're so cool!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Munch* Emma seems to be enjoying it, so I should eat more, too.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: One minute left! Do your best, guys!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Time's up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa, Emma ate one more plate than Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Mmm, that was good! You're amazing, Emma!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Not at all! You seemed to enjoy it, so I enjoyed mine so much more!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, there's some rice left. Do you mind if I finish it before we go?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'll have some more bread, too!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're kidding!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Looks like a strong bond has formed between the two big eating school idols!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can't believe Emma used the power of bread to eat so much!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (That's one win for Nijigasaki. I can't say I was expecting a contest like that. Maybe we can actually put up a good fight against them!)
